original_text: People everywhere on the earth, terror is ready to catch you! You will fall into a deep hole, and a trap will catch you! People everywhere on the earth, terror is ready to catch you! You will fall into a deep hole, and a trap will catch you!
korean_text: 땅의 주민아 두려움과 함정과 올무가 네게 이르렀나니

sentences.original_text: terror is ready to catch you!
sentences.korean_translation: 공포가 너희를 잡을 준비가 되어 있다!

sentences.original_text: You will fall into a deep hole,
and a trap will catch you!
terror is ready to catch you!
sentences.korean_translation: 공포가 너희를 잡을 준비가 되어 있다!
